lead_paragraph: The day in sports included rain at Wimbledon, Bruins goalie Tim Thomas shaving his beard for charity, and celebrations for Rory McIlroy in Holywood, Northern Ireland.
snippet: The day in sports included rain at Wimbledon, Bruins goalie Tim Thomas shaving his beard for charity, and celebrations for Rory McIlroy in Holywood, Northern Ireland.
